info.name: Stylish Editor Chrome Redesign
info.description:
A style that revamp the design for the Stylus for Chrome addon to make it more pleasant and a joy for users to use.

</br></br><mark><b>I am working on an update for that fixes some bugs, fixes some design issues and so far. I don't know when it will be release but I wanted to let you all know that this style is still be work on and updated.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 2.3 - October 20, 2016 - Latest Update !!!REQUIRED UPDATE FIX!!!
  • Icons fixed and restored
Version 2.2.7 - May 30, 2016
  • Fixes button icons not showing
Version 2.2.6 - April 3, 2016
  • Fixes design bugs caused by Stylish Update 1.5.0
Version 2.2.5 - March 19, 2016
  • Fixes design bugs caused by update 2.2
  • Improves some design elements
Version 2.2 - March 19, 2016
  • Fixed sidebar height issue
  • More design improvements
Version 2.1 - Oct 11, 2015
  • Some issues fixed and more UI improvements
Version 2.0 - Oct 09, 2015
  • Fixed broken apply rules
  • Fixed broken design caused by Stylish Update 1.4
  • Overall design improved
Version 1.0 - June 30, 2015 *Initial Release

data.title: Stylish Chrome UI Redesign - CODE FIX NOTICE
